post:
From Unbeathosting. We give $1 first month for vps 1 to 3, $5 for XEN512 and $9 for XEN1024.

*We will help to setup free of charge of item below for first time, just make sure choose right setup when sign up.
- apf firewall
- web server & php
- tomcat
- lxadmin or cPanel (required license)
- mysql
- list of others open source software (ask sales)
